(4) Axway [https://www.axway.com] Catalysts [https://catalysts.axway.com]

  • Small team of experts in the digital transformation and API space
    • Help customers to make good decisions on their API journey
    • Move the community of API practitioners and their practices forward
  • Team members are distributed globally

What are APIs and why do they matter?

Outline (What are APIs and why do they matter?)

  1. Introduction [2]
  2. What are APIs and why do they matter? [3]
  3. How are organizations making money with APIs? [5]
  4. How to get started with your API journey [2]
  5. Avoiding common pitfalls on your API journey [2]
  6. Conclusions [2]
What are APIs and why do they matter? Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(6) APIs represent Digital Building Blocks

  • Every capability is made available through an API
  • New capabilities are built on existing capabilities
  • The focus is to make all capabilities reusable


What are APIs and why do they matter? Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(7) APIs as Internal Componentization

  • Moving from integration to interconnection (IT modernization)
  • Decoupling components and their development cycles and speed
  • Improving capability reuse across the organization


What are APIs and why do they matter? Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(8) APIs as External Interfaces

  • Direct API monetization (selling APIs as products)
  • Interaction with partners (easier integration)
  • Attracting new business (outsourcing innovation)

How to get started with your API journey Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(16) What is an API?

  • An API is a digitally accessible capability
  • An API is designed with users and reuse in mind
  • An API creates value when it is consumed by users


How to get started with your API journey Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(17) From APIs to API Products

(19) APIs are a Result (not a Cause)



Avoiding common pitfalls on your API journey Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(20) From Vision to Value

  • Set a vision as the goal to improve the organization
  • Define a strategy how to turn the vision into reality
  • Create a program to turn the strategy into reality
  • Build a platform as the new foundation for creating value

Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs

(22) Making APIs Work

  • APIs represent the digital building blocks of your business
  • APIs are underlying many different business models
  • Getting started means to digitally re-imagine your business
  • Don't assume that having APIs is good enough


Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): Making Money with APIs
